title: Thing I Hope Morgana Keeps After Her Rework
body:
Morgana was the first champ I ever played, and mained, and she has special place in my heart, and now hearing she has a rework coming up, I'm overjoyed. While I'm completely fine with giving her an update to her looks, and her kit, there are a few things I hope don't change. 

For starters, her wings. The whole reason I fell in love with Morgana was the whole "Fallen Angel" concept. I do hope she'll be able to fly afterwards, and not just have a pair of useless bone wings. 

Secondly, her dress, because battle skirts are fucking badass. Also, I love how visibly thin she is, with her ribs and hip bones being very prominent, it really helps get the point across that she has been through some things, and helps give her a more sinister look, and frankly, just looks good. 

When it comes to her kit, I don't really care what happens, as long as nothing happens to her Q. It's been the staple of this champion for years, and has inspired countless memes. 

That's all I wanted to say, as a Morgana main.
